FSMIO

Class TransitionFunction<T1,T2>

  • java.lang.Object
    • FSMIO.TransitionFunction<T1,T2>
  • Type Parameters:
    T1 - the type of FSMIO inputs
    T2 - the type of FSMIO outputs

    public class TransitionFunction<T1,T2>
extends java.lang.Object
    An implementation of a transition function as a list of transitions.
    Author:
    ioannis.parissis@grenoble-inp.fr
